item.title: CVE-2024-29099|2024-03-19T15:56:14.464Z -- Evergreen Content Poster -- Evergreen Content Poster
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Evergreen Content Poster allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Evergreen Content Poster: from n/a through 1.4.1.
